name: Turnstyle Analytics Inc.
description: Turnstyle is a proximity based marketing tool for local retailers who offer their patrons free wifi. By exchanging Facebook login for free wifi, retailers can connect with people who have walked through their door in the future to boost future engagement.
one_liner: Turnstyle is a proximity based marketing tool for local retailers who offer their patrons free wifi. By exchanging Facebook login for free wifi, retailers can connect with people who have walked through their door in the future to boost future engagement.
